nodes.bodyText:
expirationTime was added twice on that query so removed one, here is the query
Jobs(where: { processInstanceId: { equal: $processInstanceId } }) {
id
processId
processInstanceId
rootProcessId
status
expirationTime
priority
callbackEndpoint
repeatInterval
repeatLimit
scheduledId
retries
lastUpdate
endpoint
}
}

nodes.bodyText: @Sara4994 we are repeating code here that we already have in JobActionsKebab. We need to reuse as much as possible in order to unify and maintain consistency.
+1 to that
after 1.0 release we will remove JobActionsKebab component and will use patternfly approach to display kebab on table. so these functions are needed as part of this PR.
whitespace formatting.
I would suggest capital initial letter in interface names.
cancelled -> canceled to be in sync
cancelled -> canceled
Maybe initial capital letter to be in sync with Non-editable below?
filtering is not planned / implemented right now, correct? Meaning - rows are all data there's here, it's not dependent on some sort of filtering?
@jstastny-cz  Filtering will be the next PR
mock also Date.now, I've seen some time sensitive items in the component definition.
I think you've added it in the test for page.
maybe add a period in the end of sentences started with capital letters?
